topic.title: Banks
topic.body: Right - who's got something funny / annoying / negative to say about their bank?

1556264224_14ag9EPpibuu24eZB36siFqaR4MGK.body:
ok, so the other day I called my bank (Barclays) who told me they were recording my call for training and monitoring purposes.

when i said i was recording the call too, they told me that was against their policy and hung up really quickly.

anyone else?
oh yeah and has anyone else more and more openly / blatantly used their bank account for bitcoin trading until they finally cancelled the account? how far can you push it?

Hard to get disgusted anymore ... just ... always pretty disgusting.

I'm glad to see there are alternatives so you can top up an online account with bitcoin etc etc

Sites like https://www.bitrefill.com/ work well too
I love it when they crack down on "pyramid schemes" and "money laundering" - apparently with no sense or irony at all.
yeah, thank you @bill84, the vid is in public domain so there's loads of ways of getting it, including torrent ... https://archive.org/download/TheMoneyMasters1996/TheMoneyMasters1996_archive.torrent
